title: Video: Hot Sugar – I Don’t Wanna B Judged (Feat. Haleek Maul)
body:
Earlier this month, NYC based producer [Hot Sugar](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18294-new-hot-sugar-midi-murder-ep/ "New: Hot Sugar – MiDi Murder EP") dropped a rather fantastic new mixtape, featuring the cream of the wackball MC crop. The record featured **Haleek Maul, Antwon, Fat Tony, Big Baby Ghandi, Heems, KOOL AD** and **Shady Blaze.** Not a bad little roster?

Well, the most publicised track from the _Midi Murder EP_**,** _I Don’t Want To Be Judged_, featuring CitR fave [Haleek Maul](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17020-stream-haleek-maul-oxyconteen/ "Stream: Haleek Maul – Oxyconteen"), now has a video. It’s, well, what you can expect from **Hot Sugar**, absolutely bat shit. It’s the age of the internet dawg…
